General.Name: Browave
General.Description: Browave Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells optical fiber communication components in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include compact coarse wavelength division multiplexers and demultiplexers; splitter modules; add/drop filters; amplifier components consisting of isolators and gain flattening filters; fused biconic taper WBC/WDM coupler and planar light wave circuit splitters; fan-out cabling systems, adapters, and patch cords/pigtails; MPO/MTP fiber optical cables; and fiber arrays, collimators, and pigtails. The company also provides optical devices and optical module products, such as isolators, couplers, DWDM, IPD, EDFA, ROSA, BOSA, etc. Its products are used in long haul communications network, metropolitan area network, central office fiber-to-the-home, and cloud data center applications. Browave Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 30, Industrial East Road IX, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30075
